STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Track New Transactions as They Happen
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - see what our users have to say about our Ethereum transaction analysis app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has been a game-changer for our team. We can now monitor new Ethereum transactions in real-time and quickly identify potential issues or opportunities.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The insights provided by this app have helped us make more informed investment decisions in the Ethereum ecosystem. The user interface is clean and intuitive.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a researcher studying Ethereum transaction patterns, this app has been invaluable. The data is comprehensive and easily exportable for further analysis.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our Ethereum transaction analysis app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Ethereum transaction analysis app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides real-time monitoring and analysis of new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain. It tracks incoming transfers, smart contract deployments, and other on-chain activity to give you valuable insights.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What kind of analysis does it provide?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The app analyzes transaction data like sender, recipient, value transferred, gas used, and smart contract code. It identifies patterns, anomalies, and provides risk scoring for suspicious transactions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How can I use the app's data?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can integrate our APIs to build custom dashboards, alerts, and reports tailored to your business needs. The data can be used for compliance, security, and operational intelligence.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Currently, the app only supports analysis of transactions on the Ethereum mainnet. However, we plan to add support for Ethereum testnets and other EVM-compatible chains soon.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Sign up for a free trial on our website. Our docs provide guides to set up data streams and start querying the Ethereum transaction data within minutes.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Gain real-time insights into new Ethereum transactions. Powerful filtering and alerting tools for tracking tokens, smart contracts, and activity from specific addresses.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge Ethereum transaction analysis. Our platform provides real-time monitoring of new transactions, allowing you to react swiftly to market movements and capitalize on emerging opportunities.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain a comprehensive understanding of Ethereum transactions with our advanced analysis tools. Dissect transaction details, trace origins, identify patterns, and uncover valuable insights to inform your decision-making process.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Never miss a beat with our highly configurable alerting system. Set custom triggers based on transaction parameters, value thresholds, or specific wallet addresses, ensuring you're promptly notified of events that matter most to your strategy.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Our platform seamlessly integrates with your existing infrastructure, allowing you to effortlessly incorporate our transaction analysis capabilities into your workflows and applications, streamlining your operations.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Leverage our powerful data visualization tools to translate complex transaction data into intuitive and actionable insights. Identify trends, spot anomalies, and make informed decisions based on visually compelling representations.
FEATURE_6_BODY: We prioritize the security and privacy of your data. Our platform employs industry-leading encryption and access control measures, ensuring your transactions and analysis remain confidential and protected from unauthorized access.
CTA_BODY: Monitor and gain valuable insights into the latest Ethereum transactions as they occur. Stay ahead of the curve with our powerful analytics platform.

CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us about your use case
Anything else you'd like to add?
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Get instant notifications for new transactions on addresses you watch
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Step through contract code execution to identify issues and bugs
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Analyze gas costs and get tips to reduce your DApp's gas footprint
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Label wallet addresses for easy tracking across your organization
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Visualize transaction flows, contract interactions and more
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Set alerts for transactions matching custom criteria you define
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: This app allows you to analyze new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time. It provides insights into transaction details, token transfers, smart contract interactions, and more.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app connects to Ethereum nodes and listens for new block notifications. When a new block is mined, it parses the transactions and extracts relevant data for analysis.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kind of analysis can I do?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: You can view transaction details like value, gas used, sender/receiver addresses. You can also detect token transfers, decode input data for contract calls, and identify internal transactions between contracts.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, the basic version of the app is free to use. We offer a paid premium plan with advanced features like transaction monitoring alerts and custom data export options.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay on top of the latest Ethereum transactions with our cutting-edge monitoring system that analyzes new transactions in real-time.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Our advanced analytics engine dissects each transaction, providing you with comprehensive insights into sender, recipient, value transferred, and more.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Set custom rules and filters to receive timely alerts and notifications for transactions that match your specified criteria, ensuring you never miss a beat.
